description: Wanderer, precedentemente noto come Scaramouche, è un personaggio Anemo che può volare e infliggere danni a distanza. Eccelle nel danno Anemo e nella mobilità aerea.

weapons.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds

info: Wanderer si concentra su danno Anemo e mobilità aerea. Priorità a CRIT, ATK% e Elemental Mastery per massimizzare i danni da Swirl.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Yuuban Meigen
skills.desc: Performs up to 3 attacks using wind blades, dealing Anemo DMG.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 3 attacks using wind blades, dealing Anemo DMG.
Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time.
Plunging Attack
Calling upon the power of anemo, plunges toward the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in his path and dealing AoE Anemo DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Hanega: Song of the Wind
skills.desc: Wanderer enters a hovering state, increasing his attack range and allowing him to move freely in the air.
skills.details_html:
Hanega: Song of the Wind
Wanderer enters a hovering state, increasing his attack range and allowing him to move freely in the air.

skills.name: Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays
skills.desc: Wanderer unleashes the power of his catalyst, dealing massive Anemo DMG to all nearby enemies.
skills.details_html:
Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays
Wanderer unleashes the power of his catalyst, dealing massive Anemo DMG to all nearby enemies.

passive_talents.name: Jade-Claimed Flower
passive_talents.desc: If Hanega: Song of the Wind comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro when cast, this instance of the Windfavored state will obtain buffs according to the contacted element.

passive_talents.name: Gales of Reverie
passive_talents.desc: When Wanderer hits opponents with Normal and Charged Attacks, he has a 16% chance to obtain the Descent effect: The next time he uses Windfavored state: Skydive, this effect is cleared, and the Skydive attack deals 30% increased DMG.

passive_talents.name: Strum the Swirling Winds
passive_talents.desc: Mora expended when ascending Bows and Catalysts is decreased by 50%.

constellations.name: Shoban: Ostentatious Plumage
constellations.desc: When in the Windfavored state, the Attack SPD of Wanderer's Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 10%.

constellations.name: Niban: Moonlit Isle Amidst White Waves
constellations.desc: When Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays is unleashed, the Cores of Sin from the previous skill will be consumed and will each increase the DMG of this Unleashed Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays by 20%.

constellations.name: Sanban: Moonflower Kusemai
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Yonban: Set Adrift into Spring
constellations.desc: When casting Hanega: Song of the Wind, should the Passive Talent 'Jade-Claimed Flower' be triggered, the character will gain buffs in correspondence to the contacted Elemental Type(s), and also obtain a random untriggered buff.

constellations.name: Matsuban: Ancient Illuminator From Abroad
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Hanega: Song of the Wind by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Shugen: The Curtains' Melancholic Sway
constellations.desc: When Wanderer actively hits an opponent with Kuugo: Fushoudan while in the Windfavored state, the following effects will occur: Deals an additional instance of Kuugo: Fushoudan at the position hit, dealing 40% of the attack's original DMG. This DMG is considered Normal Attack DMG.
